title: Bug 289818Unclosed stream in org.aspectj.weaver.bcel.ExtensibleURLClassLoader
description: Bug 289818Unclosed stream in org.aspectj.weaver.bcel.ExtensibleURLClassLoader Created attachment 147527 [details]Eclipse workspace patch that closes the streamThe method getBytes() gets a fresh stream from ClassFile and should close itafter using it.
OB: Right now, the stream is left open.A patch is attached that closes the stream.
